Text.Page:
This is supposed to be a time of cheer and feasting, not murder and terror.

The {@LinkCreature:22#11#witch prefects} and {@LinkCreature:22#12#ailuri giantkillers} are spreading terror around the academy—slow their progress to give us time to find a cure.

Don't toy with them, —be swift.

Harvesttime will never be a joyful time for me again. Not with so much tragedy to remember.

Thanks. I need to return to my studies. There might still be time to save the rest!
